body_html: I think many cases in TestJit https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/test/test_jit.py#L401 and TestJitGenerated will do the serialize/deserialize e2e tests. I will explicitly add some tests to cover the tensor related cases (such as shared storage) in #13861.
body_text: I think many cases in TestJit https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/test/test_jit.py#L401 and TestJitGenerated will do the serialize/deserialize e2e tests. I will explicitly add some tests to cover the tensor related cases (such as shared storage) in #13861.
body: I think many cases in TestJit https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/test/test_jit.py#L401 and TestJitGenerated will do the serialize/deserialize e2e tests. I will explicitly add some tests to cover the tensor related cases (such as shared storage) in https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/13861.
